title: Premiere Pro Audio Transcript Format Specification
description: JSON schema for audio transcription files with speaker identification, word-level timing, and confidence scores.

language.description: Primary language of the transcript. Must be one of the supported Premiere Pro language codes. Use '??-??' for unknown/undetermined language.

segments.description: Array of speech segments, typically grouped by speaker or pause boundaries

LanguageCode.description: Supported Premiere Pro language codes. '??-??' represents unknown/undetermined language.

Segment.description: A continuous speech segment from a single speaker

duration.description: Total duration of the segment in seconds (floating point precision)

language.description: Language of this specific segment (may differ from root language for multilingual content). Must be one of the supported Premiere Pro language codes.

speaker.description: UUID reference to the speaker who spoke this segment in version 4 (8-4-4-4-12) format. Has to be referenced in the speaker array.

start.description: Start time of the segment in seconds from the beginning of the audio

words.description: Array of individual words within this segment

Word.description: Individual word with timing and confidence information

confidence.description: Confidence score for this word recognition (0.0 to 1.0, where 1.0 is highest confidence)

duration.description: Duration of the word in seconds (floating point precision)

eos.description: End of sentence marker - true if this word ends a sentence or phrase

start.description: Start time of the word in seconds from the beginning of the audio

tags.description: Optional semantic tags or annotations for this word

text.description: The transcribed text of the word, including punctuation

id.description: Unique identifier for the speaker in UUID v4 (8-4-4-4-12) format

name.description: Human-readable name or label for the speaker
